Text.Page:
The town's being strangled by this cult in the Paraanon Plains. Those plains used to be our best farmlands. Now it's just a hole for the federation to throw troops into.

Prefect Cafnil's in charge down at the Embattled Outpost. With your help maybe we can break this stalemate.

New blood, eh?

About time! s are powerful medicine for what ails this land, as the beasts in the valley are about to learn...to their dismay! Let's talk strategy!
